text: Eric Wagner (April 24, 1959 â€“ August 22, 2021) was an American heavy metal singer-songwriter. He was best known for his work with doom metal band Trouble. He formed the band in 1979. He also appeared on Dave Grohl's heavy metal side project Probot in 2004. He also formed The Skull. Wagner died on August 22, 2021 from pneumonia caused by COVID-19 at the age of 62. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Nevada Category:American heavy metal singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock singers
title: Eric Wagner
